typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		ActivityName as string,
		TaskNo as float,
		PlanStart as timestamp,
		PlanFinish as timestamp,
		ActualStart as timestamp,
		ActualFinish as timestamp,
		WCSIndicator as string,
		Note as string,
		PendingStatus as integer,
		Remarks as string,
		ProgressPercent as decimal(5,2),
		Weightage as decimal(10,3),
		Group as string,
		TANO as string,
		WorklistID as string,
		IsDeleted as boolean,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		CreatedBy as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		ModifiedBy as string,
		PhaseID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PITSTOPSOutput
